item.title: About me
item.author: keven.villeneuve@gmail.com (Keven Villeneuve)
item.description: Hi my name is Keven Villeneuve, I am a Software engineer specialized in computer graphics. I like to say that I am passionate about technology, I strive for simple & elegant solutions. Genuinely curious, I love learning about math and physics. I also have a strong interest in low level programming and understanding how everything fits together. Education M.Eng. Computer Engineering (Thesis), McGill University Specialization in Computer Graphics and Machine Learning B.
